name: Sorcerer's Dream
description: Boy meets girl against a backdrop of magical battles in a dramatic visual novel!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 (64-bit or 32-bit) Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720, 32-bit colors, vertex shader 2.0, pixel shader 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 709 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compliant device
